fields.name: Rahul Puppala
fields.title: Aspiring ML Engineer
fields.intro: I don’t just write code—I solve problems that matter. Let’s build the future, together.
content: Welcome — I'm an AI engineer with a deep focus on crafting scalable, production-grade solutions.
From real-time data pipelines to intelligent systems, I build tools that drive impact and efficiency.
I'm passionate about tech communities and actively working towards building spaces for shared learning and collaboration.

fields.bio: Engineer by training, problem-solver by mindset. I thrive at the intersection of innovation, logic, and purpose.
fields.current_focus: Currently diving deep into AI product engineering—building scalable, efficient, and intelligent backend systems that solve real-world challenges.
fields.hobbies: Journaling my learnings, exploring spiritual philosophies, and staying curious about everything from code to consciousness.
content: My journey into tech started with curiosity and evolved into a commitment to build meaningful systems.
While I'm focused on engineering, I equally value communication, empathy, and community—traits that turn coders into creators.
I believe in shipping fast, learning faster, and always leaving systems better than I found them.
I write a weekly newsletter on LinkedIn where I share insights, learning paths, and reflections on AI, backend systems, and tech careers.
The newsletter is crafted to add value for developers, learners, and tech leaders alike—short, actionable, and thought-provoking.
It’s more than content—it's my way of building a community through consistent learning and conversation.
